text:
Jotabasso is a family company, originated
in the state of Rio Grande do Sul,
and they moved to the cerrado in the 1970s and today

We have completed 50 years of history.
We have the pleasure and the pride

of being one of the first seed companies
in the Brazilian cerrado and
we produce our own seeds for marketing.

Jotabasso operates an agribusiness, 
both in the agricultural operation
and the marketing and multiplication of seeds.

Jotabasso currently has five production
units, spread from the south of Mato
Grosso do Sul to Mato Grosso,
reaching a commercial capillarity for the
marketing of seeds in the north, mid-west, and south regions of Brazil.

Jotabasso today is one of the
main seed companies in agribusiness

here in the Brazilian mid-west.
It is a great challenge to

grow and to be always updated
in the technology trends in Brazil.

We really needed to bring the company's
data into a data warehouse in a

cloud structure, so we organized and
structured a project called Falcon 9 that

compiled all this data and generate that
information that were made available through

a visualization layer, and AWS
helped us a lot to reach this goal.

We chose AWS because they
are one of the biggest players in

the cloud computing market today
and Jotabasso felt safe to access

these technologies through
this provider, so it was easy to choose,

and we were fully convinced
that it would work out.

We used several AWS
services, including: RDS, EC2,

EKS, and other solutions that
helped us solve this problem.

Solving this problem, together
with AWS, helped us with one of

the company's main goals, which is
to improve the data culture, so we

could, together with our
business areas, consolidate the

information through this infrastructure 
and present it through the

visualization tools that we
connected to deliver value to the areas.

At the end of the day, the users
ended up seeing several results linked to

the solution, and they could access
information in an easier way and make

decisions in their daily lives more
easily and present all these results to our board.

decisions in their daily lives more
easily and present all these results to our board.

We believe that companies from
the same segment as Jotabasso can

approach AWS to develop a different
way of thinking about new technologies.
